analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/30/0xc9ff82c958ec92dac048b6fb804c3f7517603c89.sol#458-466) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc9ff82c958ec92dac048b6fb804c3f7517603c89.sol#460-464)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/30/0xc9ff82c958ec92dac048b6fb804c3f7517603c89.sol#475-484) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/30/0xc9ff82c958ec92dac048b6fb804c3f7517603c89.sol#484)
